item.title: Urban Company IPO: Long-term bet on operational leverage

review.headline_rewrite: Urban Company IPO: Long-term bet on operational leverage
bullets: Urban Company, India’s leading full stack online home services company, will hit the street this week with its ₹1,900-crore IPO.
At the higher end of IPO price band of ₹103 per share, the company will be valued at a market cap of ₹14,790 crore
Hence, it does command a steep valuation of 12 times FY25 EV/revenue.

item.title: PNB signs MoU with Rajasthan govt for ₹21,000 crore financial assistance

review.headline_rewrite: PNB signs MoU with Rajasthan govt for ₹21,000 crore financial assistance
bullets: Public sector bank Punjab National Bank on Saturday signed a MoU with the government of Rajasthan.
The objective of this understanding is to facilitate an investment of ₹21,000 crore under the state government's 'Rising Rajasthan' initiative.
He further stated that this agreement will provide a dedicated framework for financing eligible projects in the state and is part of PNB's mission
